name: cropbytes-contracts
description: Contains Smart Contracts for the CBX token used in CropBytes

scripts.verify:ropsten: truffle run verify --network ropsten CropBytes && truffle run verify --network ropsten CropBytesVesting
scripts.deploy:ropsten: truffle  migrate --network ropsten CropBytes && npm run verify:ropsten
scripts.verify:mainnet: truffle run verify --network eth CropBytes && truffle run verify --network eth CropBytesVesting
scripts.deploy:mainnet: truffle  migrate --network eth CropBytes && npm run verify:mainnet
